titleStmt.title: A funeral sermon, preached March 13. 1697/8. For Mr. William Hartley, of Newport-Pagnel, apothecary. By J. Gibbs.
titleStmt.author: Gibbs, John, 1627?-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Mark Conyers, bookseller, at Newport-Pagnel: and sold by A. Roper in Fleetstreet, and G. Conyers in Little-Britain,
